tool_description: Generate HTML image-tag with base64-image-string OR generate image-file stream as QR code of input text.
name: QR-Generator-Api
title: QR-Generator-Api

api_list.name: Generate
api_list.description: Generate HTML image-tag with base64-image-string as QR code of input text (Query Parameter)

optional_parameters.name: pixelsPerModule
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) The pixel size each b/w module is drawn (Default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: backColor
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Background color in hexadecimal value (Default: White = #ffffff). Note: Should start with # prefix, and each basic-color (red, green, blue) should has two hex-digits.

optional_parameters.name: foreColor
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Foreground color in hexadecimal value (Default: Black = #000000). Note: Should start with # prefix, and each basic-color (red, green, blue) should has two hex-digits.

api_list.name: Generate File
api_list.description: Generate image file stream as QR code of input text (Query Parameter)

optional_parameters.name: backColor
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Background color in hexadecimal value (Default: White = #ffffff). Note: Should start with # prefix, and each basic-color (red, green, blue) should has two hex-digits.

optional_parameters.name: pixelsPerModule
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) The pixel size each b/w module is drawn (Default: 10)

optional_parameters.name: foreColor
optional_parameters.description: (Optional) Foreground color in hexadecimal value (Default: Black = #000000). Note: Should start with # prefix, and each basic-color (red, green, blue) should has two hex-digits.
